trans-unit.source: Provides a control array of <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ADODC" /> controls.
trans-unit.target: 提供 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ADODC" /> 控制項的控制項陣列。

trans-unit.source: The `ADODCArray` class provides an equivalent for the run-time functionality of a Visual Basic 6.0 `ADODC` control array.
trans-unit.target: `ADODCArray`類別提供對等項目執行階段功能的 Visual Basic 6.0`ADODC`控制項陣列。

trans-unit.source: It does not provide the design-time features of a Visual Basic 6.0 control array.
trans-unit.target: 它不提供 Visual Basic 6.0 控制項陣列的設計階段功能。

trans-unit.source: Functions and objects in the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6> namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6> 命名空間中的函式和物件都是供這些工具使用，以便從 Visual Basic 6.0 升級至 [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 在大多數情況下，這些函式和物件會複製在 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 的其他命名空間中可以找到的功能。

trans-unit.source: They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.
trans-unit.target: 只有當 Visual Basic 6.0 程式碼模型與 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 實作有顯著差異時，才需要這些項目。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ADODCArray" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ADODCArray" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ADODCArray" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ADODCArray" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: When you instantiate an <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ADODCArray>, you must also call the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ADODCArray.SetIndex%2A> method to create the initial element in the array.
trans-unit.target: 當您具現化<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ADODCArray>，您也必須呼叫<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ADODCArray.SetIndex%2A>方法來建立陣列中的初始項目。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.IContainer" /> where the control array will be hosted.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.IContainer" />，其中將會裝載控制項陣列。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ADODCArray" /> class, specifying its container.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ADODCArray" /> 類別的新執行個體，並指定其容器。

trans-unit.source: When you instantiate an <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ADODCArray>, you must also call the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ADODCArray.SetIndex%2A> method to create the initial element in the array.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ADODC" /> control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ADODC" /> 控制項。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that determines whether a control is a member of an <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ADODCArray" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，以判斷控制項是否為 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ADODCArray" /> 的成員。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="target" /> is a member of the control array; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="target" /> 為控制項陣列的成員，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The `CanExtend` method can be used to determine whether a specific <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ADODC> control is the base element of the control array from which the other elements were cloned.
trans-unit.target: `CanExtend`方法可用來判斷特定<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ADODC>控制項是其他項目已從中複製的控制項陣列的基底項目。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when an <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ADODC" /> in an <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ADODCArray" /> is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 發生於按一下 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ADODC" /> 中的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ADODCArray" /> 時。

trans-unit.source: The `Click` event passes an <xref:System.EventArgs> to its event handler.
trans-unit.target: `Click`事件會傳遞<xref:System.EventArgs>至其事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: Therefore it only indicates that a click has occurred.
trans-unit.target: 因此它只會顯示已發生按。

trans-unit.source: If you need more specific mouse information (button, number of clicks, wheel rotation, or location), use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseClick> event.
trans-unit.target: 如果您需要更多滑鼠資訊 （按鈕點選、 滾輪旋轉或位置的數目），使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseClick>事件。

trans-unit.source: However, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseClick> event will not be raised if the click is caused by action other than that of the mouse, such as pressing the ENTER key.
trans-unit.target: 不過，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseClick>如果按一下因滑鼠，例如按下 ENTER 鍵以外的其他動作，將不會引發事件。

trans-unit.source: A double-click is determined by the mouse settings of the user's operating system.
trans-unit.target: 按兩下是由使用者的作業系統的滑鼠設定決定。

trans-unit.source: The user can set the time between clicks of a mouse button that should be considered a double-click instead of two clicks.
trans-unit.target: 使用者可以設定應該才視為按兩下，而不是兩次按一下滑鼠按鍵的按一下之間的時間。

trans-unit.source: The `Click` event is raised every time that a control is double-clicked.
trans-unit.target: `Click`每當按兩下控制項時，就會引發事件。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you have event handlers for the `Click` and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleClick> events of a [control](ms-help://MS.VSCC.v90/MS.MSDNQTR.v90.en/fxref_system.windows.forms/html/6569d671-0a28-7b3f-dbb8-90c3d272b6e2.htm), the `Click` and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleClick> events are raised when the control is double-clicked and both methods are called.
trans-unit.target: 比方說，如果您有事件處理常式`Click`和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleClick>事件[控制項](ms-help://MS.VSCC.v90/MS.MSDNQTR.v90.en/fxref_system.windows.forms/html/6569d671-0a28-7b3f-dbb8-90c3d272b6e2.htm)、`Click`和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleClick>按兩下控制項時，會呼叫這兩種方法時，會引發事件。

trans-unit.source: If a control is double-clicked and that control does not support the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleClick> event, the `Click` event might be raised two times.
trans-unit.target: 如果按兩下控制項時，以及控制項不支援<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleClick>事件，`Click`事件可能會引發兩次。

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: The `GiveFeedback` event is raised when a drag-and-drop operation is started.
trans-unit.target: `GiveFeedback`拖放作業開始時，就會引發事件。

trans-unit.source: By using the `GiveFeedback` event, you can configure the source of a drag event to modify the appearance of the mouse pointer in order to give the user visual feedback during a drag-and-drop operation.
trans-unit.target: 使用`GiveFeedback`事件，您可以設定的修改滑鼠指標外觀，以便將使用者視覺化回應提供拖放作業期間的拖曳事件來源。

trans-unit.source: The `KeyPress` event is not raised by noncharacter keys; however, the noncharacter keys do raise the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyUp> events.
trans-unit.target: `KeyPress`非字元的索引鍵不會引發事件; 不過，並引發非字元按鍵<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyUp>事件。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyPressEventArgs.KeyChar%2A> property to sample keystrokes at run time and to consume or modify a subset of common keystrokes.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyPressEventArgs.KeyChar%2A>屬性範例按鍵輸入，在執行階段，並且將會使用或修改一般按鍵的子集。

trans-unit.source: To handle keyboard events only at the form level and not enable controls to receive keyboard events, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyPressEventArgs.Handled%2A> property in the form's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyPress> event-handling method to `true`.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a control should reposition its child controls.
trans-unit.target: 發生於控制項應重新調整其子控制項位置時。

trans-unit.source: The `Layout` event occurs when child controls are added or removed, when the bounds of the control changes, and when other changes occur that can affect the layout of the control.
trans-unit.target: `Layout`子控制項所新增或移除，當控制項變更，以及其他可能變更的範圍可能會影響控制項的配置時，就會發生事件。

trans-unit.source: The layout event can be suppressed by using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SuspendLayout%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ResumeLayout%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 配置事件，可以使用抑制<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SuspendLayout%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ResumeLayout%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Suspending layout enables you to perform multiple actions on a control without having to perform a layout for each change.
trans-unit.target: 暫止配置可讓您在控制項上執行多個動作，而不需要執行的每個變更的配置。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you resize and move a control, each operation would raise a `Layout` event.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果您調整大小並移動控制項，每一項作業將會引發`Layout`事件。

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

trans-unit.source: A typical use of `MouseHover` is to display a tool tip when the mouse pauses on a control within a specified area around the control (the "hover rectangle").
trans-unit.target: 典型用法`MouseHover`是當滑鼠停留 （「 停留矩形內，"） 的控制項周圍的指定區域內的控制項上時顯示工具提示。

trans-unit.source: The pause required for this event to be raised is specified in milliseconds by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.MouseHoverTime%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 以毫秒為單位的指定會引發這個事件所需的暫停<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.MouseHoverTime%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The `MouseHover` event is defined and detected in connection with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.MouseHoverSize%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.MouseHoverTime%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: `MouseHover`事件定義，且與偵測到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.MouseHoverSize%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.MouseHoverTime%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the control is resized.
trans-unit.target: 發生於重設控制項大小時。

trans-unit.source: To determine the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A> of the resized control, you can cast the `sender` parameter of the <xref:System.EventArgs> data to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> and get its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A> property (or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width%2A> properties individually).
trans-unit.target: 若要判斷<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A>的調整大小的控制項，您可以轉型`sender`參數<xref:System.EventArgs>資料<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>並取得其<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A>屬性 (或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width%2A>屬性個別)。

trans-unit.source: To handle custom layouts, use the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ADODCArray.Layout> event instead of the `Resize` event.
trans-unit.target: 若要處理自訂版面配置，使用<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ADODCArray.Layout>事件，而不是`Resize`事件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ADODCArray.Layout> event is raised in response to a `Resize` event, but also in response to other changes that affect the layout of the control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ADODCArray.Layout>引發以回應`Resize`事件，但也在其他會影響控制項的配置變更回應。

trans-unit.source: The `SetIndex` method should be called only when you are creating the initial element in the control array.
trans-unit.target: `SetIndex`應該呼叫方法，僅當您建立的初始項目控制項陣列中。

trans-unit.source: To add subsequent elements, call the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.BaseControlArray.Load%2A> method and specify the `Index`.
trans-unit.target: 若要將後續項目，呼叫<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.BaseControlArray.Load%2A>方法並指定`Index`。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether an <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ADODC" /> control is a member of this <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ADODCArray" />.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the control is finished validating.
trans-unit.target: 發生於控制項完成驗證時。

trans-unit.source: When you change the focus by using the keyboard (TAB, SHIFT+TAB, and so on), by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Select%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SelectNextControl%2A> methods, or by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContainerControl.ActiveControl%2A> property to the current form, focus events occur in the following order:
trans-unit.target: 當您藉由呼叫中使用鍵盤 （TAB、 SHIFT + TAB，等等） 變更焦點時<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Select%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SelectNextControl%2A>方法，或藉由設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContainerControl.ActiveControl%2A>屬性目前的表單，焦點事件會發生順序如下：

trans-unit.source: When you change the focus by using the mouse or by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Focus%2A> method, focus events occur in the following order:
trans-unit.target: 當您將焦點變更使用滑鼠或藉由呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Focus%2A>方法，焦點事件會依下列順序發生：

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CausesValidation%2A> property is set to `false`, the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ADODCArray.Validating> and `Validated` events are suppressed.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CausesValidation%2A>屬性設定為`false`、<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ADODCArray.Validating>和`Validated`事件都會被隱藏。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs> is set to `true` in the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ADODCArray.Validating> event delegate, all events that would usually occur after the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ADODCArray.Validating> event are suppressed.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>屬性<xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs>設`true`中<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ADODCArray.Validating>事件委派，通常會在之後發生的所有事件<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ADODCArray.Validating>事件都會被隱藏。

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs> is set to `true` in the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ADODCArray.Validating> event delegate, all events that would usually occur after the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ADODCArray.Validating> event are suppressed.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>屬性<xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs>設`true`中<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ADODCArray.Validating>事件委派，通常會在之後發生的所有事件<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ADODCArray.Validating>事件都會被隱藏。

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: Functions and objects in the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6> namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6> 命名空間中的函式和物件都是供這些工具使用，以便從 Visual Basic 6.0 升級至 [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 在大多數情況下，這些函式和物件會複製在 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 的其他命名空間中可以找到的功能。

trans-unit.source: They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.
trans-unit.target: 只有當 Visual Basic 6.0 程式碼模型與 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 實作有顯著差異時，才需要這些項目。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Visible" /> property value changes.
trans-unit.target: 發生在 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Visible" /> 屬性值變更時。

trans-unit.source: This event is raised if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Visible%2A> property is changed by either a programmatic modification or user interaction.
trans-unit.target: 如果會引發這個事件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Visible%2A>以程式設計方式修改或使用者互動變更屬性。
